title: Fiue godly, and profitable sermons concerning 1 The slaverie of sinne. 2 The mischiefe of ignorance. 3 The roote of apostasie. 4 The benefit of Gods service. 5 The Christians loue. Preached in his life time in sundry places. By that late faithfull minister of Christ Mr William Pemble of Magdalen Hall in the Vniversity of Oxford.
author: Pemble, William, 1592?-1623.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield, printer to the famous Vniversitie, and are to be sold by Edward Forrest,
